post/2003/A Gallery Picture

tags

note/2003
date

2003-06-29

I got tired of having no pictures in the Image Gallery since the last site shuffle, so I finally decided to throw in a scan of a knotwork picture. That’s the biggest change to the site, although there is a new page of links to information about Raku . It will make it easier on me to keep that information in a single place, rather than rely on my memory.

Now, if you’ll excuse me, I’ve got a Harry Potter book to read.

2024-07-05: I’ll find that scan and re-post it eventually.
